Overview: This Privacy Policy explains how orbt.stream, operated by bradydallama LLC, collects, uses, and protects your information.
We value privacy and collect only what's necessary to power our widgets and integrations.
Information We Collect: When connecting Twitch, we may receive:
Twitch user ID, username, profile image, and email address
Subscriber, follower, Bits, Channel Points, poll, and prediction data
Basic channel statistics (follower count, subscription count, partner plus progress, bits count)
We only store limited information required for widget functionality:
All other data is processed temporarily and not stored.
Cookies: We use one cookie to maintain a user's orbtId.
We do not use analytics, advertising, or third-party tracking cookies.
How We Use Data: Maintain account connections and session state
We do not sell, share, or rent user data to third parties.
Data Retention and Deletion: You can disconnect your Twitch account or delete your orbt.stream profile at any time.
Deleted profiles and stored data are permanently erased within a reasonable timeframe.
Changes to This Policy: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically.
Significant changes will be announced via notice on the site.
Contact: For privacy or data deletion requests, please reach out in our Discord server.
